Class TransactionManager

java.lang.Object
TransactionManager
public class TransactionManager
extends java.lang.Object
This is the user interface class that handles the transactions and displays the results on the console.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Runs the Transaction Manager

    • createAccount

      private void createAccount​(AccountDatabase accounts, java.util.Scanner scan, java.lang.String command)
      Helper method or facilitate the creation of accounts after the char C is entered.
      Parameters:
      accounts - : passes the accounts variable to allow for addition to it
      scan - : scan is passed to save resources so multiple scanners don't need to be made.
      command - : is passed for simplicity and is used to determine the type of account to create.

    • closeAccount

      private void closeAccount​(AccountDatabase accounts, java.util.Scanner scan, java.lang.String command)
      Helper method or facilitate the removal of accounts after the char C is entered.
      Parameters:
      accounts - : passes the accounts varible to allow for addition to it
      scan - : scan is passed to save reasourses so multiple scanners don't need to be made.
      command - : is passed for simplicity and is used to determine the type of account to create.

    • accountDirector

      private void accountDirector​(AccountDatabase accounts, java.util.Scanner scan, java.lang.String command, char type)
      Helper method to deposit/withdraw to the proper account
      Parameters:
      accounts - the account database
      scan - commandline scanner for user input
      command - the account type
      type - W if withdrawing, D if Depositing

    • printHelper

      private void printHelper​(AccountDatabase accounts, java.util.Scanner scan, java.lang.String command)
      Helper method to print using the proper sorting method
      Parameters:
      accounts - database
      scan - commandline scanner for input
      command - A for Accounts, D for by Date, and L for by Last Name
